slider.alt: photo of work done for Triplebeam LLC
photo of work done for Le'Vonne Inspirations
slider.testimonial: What a great company!  Professional and very informative. There are so many website companies, with all the research I did I am so happy that I used Expansive Designs to create my website. They helped me create something that was tailored to exactly what I wanted to create and help me decide on the best marketing style for my company. The price is so very reasonable. I highly recommend using this company.

slider.testimonial: Thanks for your great job...  you really have full knowledge of BDE. . .  You will always be part of us and be part of us going global.  I appreciate you for taking your time to do this, it is really awesome work.

slider.alt: photo of work done for EKDNYC
slider.testimonial: TaLoveous is easy to work with, is on top of the project and always offering solutions for current and future design challenges. So, I look forward to working with her in the future.

slider.alt: photo of work done for Flamekeeper's Hat Club
slider.testimonial: TaLoveous is AWESOME to work with.  She always responds in a timely manner and always explores every option until she finds cost effective, time saving solutions to any problem. I highly recommend Expansive Designs.

slider.alt: photo of work done for The HVAC Doc
slider.testimonial: I was looking for a simple way just to get my name out there. This website exceeded my expectations.  I allows my clients to get a full picture of what I do but also allows me to get important information about their needs so that I am ready to deliver the service they need.

slider.alt: photo of work done for Legendary Gemstone LLC
slider.testimonial: I feel that I'm more connected with my clients and can build a relationship with them.  There are links to my social media and educational videos so that I can get my name out there and promote my product through various mediums.  The very eye-catching logo pops and has vibrant colors that will definitely attract natural stone lovers.

slider.alt: photo of work done for Prime Manhattan Realty
slider.testimonial: Expansive Designs provided my company with outstanding forward thinking work - TaLoveous' attention to detail and commitment to quality stands heads above what most programmers do today - she went above and beyond and for that we highly recommend Expansive Designs for your coding and web needs! Outside of her work TaLoveous is a warm and kind person who's a delight to work with - her professionalism and tenacity helped to bring our projects to fruition well within schedule!

slider.testimonial: I was very pleased with her work. Even if I disagreed with her recommendations, we were able to cooperatively find acceptable or better solutions. She gives great value for the fees she charges.

slider.alt: photo of work done for Genesis Aesthetics
slider.testimonial: I was very pleased with her work. Even if I disagreed with her recommendations, we were able to cooperatively find acceptable or better solutions. She gives great value for the fees she charges.
slider.aria: From the very beginning my experience was great. We were constantly in contact for every step along the way of building an amazing site. Anything I didn't understand was explained in detail and always resolved immediately. I've used other web designers in the past and issues take a long time, sometimes never get done and you can never contact them if you have any trouble. This experience was 100% the opposite whereby I would get an email explaining everything right away and if that didn't work I received a personal phone call. I highly recommend all of the offered services and you won't go wrong.
